constituent: congratulations, add, power, muscle, arnold, mouth, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: When someone at work gets married, you pass around an envelope to which you add some money and a card which you sign with your congratulations.
koohiiStory2: Congratulations are so much better when you add money to them.
myStory: chúc mừng. chữ Hạ. thêm vỏ sò để chúc mừng
words: 祝賀(しゅくが): celebration, congratulations
